targets.expr:
label_replace(
    histogram_quantile(1, rate(substrate_proposer_block_constructed_bucket{app="aleph-node-validator"}[5m])),
    "region_ip",
    "$1$2",
    "instance",
    "([0-9]*)\\.([0-9]*)\\..*"
) + on (region_ip) group_left(topology_kubernetes_io_region) 0 * count by (region_ip, topology_kubernetes_io_region)
(
    label_replace(
      container_memory_max_usage_bytes{},
      "region_ip",
      "$1$2",
      "instance",
      "ip-([0-9]*)-([0-9]*)-.*"
    )
)

label_replace(

    "instance",

) + on (region_ip) group_left(topology_kubernetes_io_region) 0 * count by (region_ip, topology_kubernetes_io_region)

    label_replace(

      "region_ip",
      "$1$2",
      "instance",
      "ip-([0-9]*)-([0-9]*)-.*"
    )
)
